title: Frontend developer
resume: Hi, I'm Alexander Maestre - a Frontend developer with a specialized focus on creating attractive and functional web interfaces.
coffeeapp-description: A web application that was built using the CRISP DM Methodology to develop a prediction model for the coffee production in Colombia.
frontendapp-description: A web application to provide services in layaout of web pages, with adaptative design to different dispositives and a friendly view.
nominaapp-description: A simple web application that was built to simulate the professors payment at University Popular of Cesar.
travelapp-description: A web application that simulate a web platform to provide travel services around the world.
restryapp-description: A simple web application to test API REST responses.
reserhabapp-description: A web application to reserve rooms in Valledupar city in Colombia.
profile-about-one: I'm a system engineer student with academic  experience in Frontend developing and a specialized focus in creating  attractive, functional web interfaces.
profile-about-two: I have solid knowledge in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as in Angular Framework.
profile-about-three: My objective is use my technique skills to design and develop high quality user experiences, focus in usability and efficiency.
foot-about-description: I'm a Frontend developer with a specialized focus on creating attractive and functional web interfaces.
